column1: Uchi////Both dishes turned out well.  Especially the Yellowtail roll.  The Wagyu Roll was not cooked like they told me it would be
column2: but rather it was on the rare side
column3: almost like it was seared pieces of meat but the entire inside was a bloody red color.  They told me sorry and that they would take it back and make me another one
column4: but since I was starving hungry.... I choked it down.   It didn't hit the spot
column5: but rather took my hunger pains away instead.   I'm not afraid to eat raw meat
column6: just wasn't expecting it after my extremely attentive waiter told me it was not raw.
